publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2033.1 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Proposed Change to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2033) in the name of Jackie Baillie, leave out from "believes" to end and insert "recognises that the existing eligibility criterion, which excludes disabled people in receipt of the lower rate of disability allowance, was set by the former administration and that the future of the National Concessionary Travel Scheme will be determined by the Scottish Government in due course, following the review of the scheme later this year." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-2033.1 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Proposed Change to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2033) in the name of Jackie Baillie, leave out from "believes" to end and insert "recognises that the existing eligibility criterion, which excludes disabled people in receipt of the lower rate of disability allowance, was set by the former administration and that the future of the National Concessionary Travel Scheme will be determined by the Scottish Government in due course, following the review of the scheme later this year."
S3M-2033.1 Proposed Change to the National Concessionary Travel Scheme (lodged on 5 June 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
